scripts.start: concurrently -k -n STYLING,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run style_simple" "NODE_ENV=development node sandbox/output/script"
scripts.backend_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER,NODEMON -c gray,blue "npm run compile_typescript" "npm run server_dev"
scripts.frontend_dev: concurrently -k -n COMPILER_1,COMPILER_2 -c gray,blue "npm run compile_typescript" "npm run compile_gas"
scripts.simple: concurrently -k -n TS-LINT,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run ts-lint" "npm run simpleGit_dev"
scripts.server: concurrently -k -n TS-LINT,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run ts-lint" "npm run server_dev"
scripts.sandbox: concurrently -k -n TS-LINT,CODE -c grey,blue "npm run ts-lint" "npm run sandbox_dev"
scripts.gas: concurrently -k -n TS-LINT,CODE -c gray,blue "npm run ts-lint" "npm run gas_dev"
